ta.title: லிட்ரோ வாயு விலைகள் கீழே
body_lines: நள்ளிரவில் இருந்து எரிவாயு விலையைக் குறைக்க லிட்ரோ கேஸ் தலைவர் (04) தலைவர், லிட்ரோ கேஸ் தலைவர் இன்று காலை தெரிவித்தார்.

en.title: Litrow gas prices down
body_lines: Chairman of Litro Gas Chairman (04) to reduce gas prices from midnight, Litro Gas Chairman said this morning.
Accordingly, a 12.5 kilogram gas cylinder has been reduced by Rs.
The price of a 5kg gas cylinder has been reduced by Rs. 1,525 million.
A 2.3 kilogram gas cylinder has been reduced by Rs.

summary_lines: Litro Gas Lanka announced a reduction in gas prices effective from midnight. A 12.5 kg cylinder now costs less, as do 5kg and 2.3 kg cylinders.
